xmltograf.py¶

This module is to create a GrAF file from the Annotation Tree data hierarchies.

class xmltograf.RendToGrAF(filepath)[source]¶

Class to rend the test_split files from the Annotation Tree to GrAF.

Methods

parse_xml_graf(type)[source]¶

Parsing of the file of the given type to GrAF xml file.

Parameters :

type : str

Type is the components of each data hierarchies, like wfw, morpheme, graid 1 and graid 2.
